sections.title: LinkOps AI-BOX with Jade Assistant
sections.subtitle: Plug-and-play AI for property management
sections.summary: AI-BOX that plugs directly into property managers' computers, embedding their data for instant AI assistance with delinquencies, work orders, vendor payments, and scheduling.
highlights: Plug into existing PM systems → instant data embedding → AI-powered responses
Natural conversations: 'How many delinquencies?' → 'We have 5 this month. Send notices?' → 'Yes please.'
Automates work order tickets, vendor payments, and scheduling tasks
Reduces manual work from hours to seconds with intelligent task execution
use_cases: Delinquency management and automated notice sending
Work order tracking and vendor coordination
Instant property portfolio insights and reporting
